item.title: By: Kerr
item.dc:creator: Kerr
item.description: <p>The designers have done such a good job of making it look like it came straight out of 1984 that I have to wonder if they hammed it up for a joke. Of course the people commissioning it won't have got the joke and thought it was brilliant.<br /><br />Scary indeed, but remember...<br /><br />Be Pure. Be Vigilant. Behave!<br /><br /><img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GL7/$File/undecided.gif"</a> /><br /></p>
item.content:encoded:
The designers have done such a good job of making it look like it came straight out of 1984 that I have to wonder if they hammed it up for a joke. Of course the people commissioning it won’t have got the joke and thought it was brilliant.

Scary indeed, but remember…

Be Pure. Be Vigilant. Behave!

http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GL7/$File/undecided.gif“ />
